page.title: 14CHURCHES IN BRIGG (CONTD.)
page.content:
{Other uses of the premises:} a) Occasionally used by the Playgroup b) Old Peoples' Welfare hold an annual lunch c) Local Committee meetings d) Local preachers meetings e) Fund raising efforts f) Circuit meetings
{Saint John's Church of England: {Vicar:}The Rev. Canon R A Cochrane A.K.C {Congregation:}Sunday Morning Service lOO - Sunday Evening Service 4O {Churchwardens:} Mr J H Lawrence and Mr C A Middleton {Oranist}and{Choirmaster:}Mr P Davies {Societies: {Mothers' Union:} 45 members meet once a month on the third Tuesday at 2 pm. Members must be confirmed members of the church.
